Title: Modifies the definition of telehealth provider
Summary: Modifies the definition of telehealth provider to include any health care provider who possesses the requisite license, certification, registration, authorization or credentialing to provide a health care service in New York state and determines that it is clinically appropriate to deliver such health care service via telehealth.
LawCode: Amd ยง2999-cc, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to modifying the definition of telehealth provider
